name: Heroes of Might and Magic 4: Winds of War
name_original: Heroes of Might and Magic 4: Winds of War
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic 4: Winds of War is a strategy game developed by New World Computing. It came out on 01-03-2003. The 3DO Company published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Heroes of Might and Magic 4: Winds of War is available on PC.
